publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3767.1 Mrs Nanette Milne: Blood Productsâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-3767) in the name of Carolyn Leckie, leave out from "accepts" to end and insert "extends its sympathy to those infected with Hepatitis C through contaminated blood products; welcomes the move to place information in the public domain, and believes at this moment in time that the best way to get clear decisive answers would be for those campaigners to bring forward a test case to the courts."
